title: kinematic tag doesn't get loaded from SDF

content.raw:
The kinematic tag for links doesn't get loaded from SDFs (this can be seen by selecting the link in the GUI.) However, Gazebo does respect the "kinematic" property when it is selected manually in the GUI. I'm using Gazebo 5.1.0. 

To reproduce:

* Add the two attached files to a folder in your `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`
* Open Gazebo, insert the block model.
* click on "block" -> "link"
* Notice `kinematic` is unchecked.

It was reported [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/1034/simbody-init-does-not-read-gravity-mode) and marked as resolved but it's still busted.

To reproduce:

  • Add the two attached files to a folder in your GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH
  • Open Gazebo, insert the block model.
  • click on "block" -> "link"
  • Notice kinematic is unchecked.

It was reported here and marked as resolved but it's still busted.
